text: Spas Penev (born 10 June 1933) is a Bulgarian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman featherweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Bulgaria Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Pernik
title: Spas Penev
